<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>List application usage by type</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/mt/monitor/v1/agg/applicationUsage"}></MethodEndpoint>



Retrieve a list of application usage by application type.                   


## Request
